text: ۞ إِنَّمَا يَسۡتَجِيبُ ٱلَّذِينَ يَسۡمَعُونَۘ وَٱلۡمَوۡتَىٰ يَبۡعَثُهُمُ ٱللَّهُ ثُمَّ إِلَيۡهِ يُرۡجَعُونَ
translation: 36.Nabiyow cagalah atu sinam fan как secta iimaan oggoltam kuyab Raaqisuh ankacsa mara, korosuh tu-gactek usun Rabe marih loowot yaniiniih, Yalli Rabe mara Qhiyaamah ayró magooqak Nuwwuk yayyaaqe, tohuk lakal usun cisab kee galtoh kaâ fanah gacsiman.
